column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"You can only carry so many items at one time, but if you use your storage from time to time, you can avoid drowning in your own junk."
"The default storage can hold up to 200 items, but if you expand it, it becomes even more useful."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old days, when I tried to stuff my junk into a... "
